articles.title: Roommates 31 years apart in age free one another from hiding Parkinson’s
articles.description: Roommates Li Jiang and Elaine Jongsma are 31 years apart in age, but they have much in common. Their late November birthdays fall one day away from one another, and celebrations are set for this weekend. They love debriefing after first dates, lingering in each other’s doorways to chat about the day
